name: Diabeaters
subtitle: Type 1 Diabetes Companion (Lifestyle, not medical advice)
description: Keep T1D life simple. Diabeaters helps you track supplies, manage routines, and feel ready for meals, exercise, and travel. Clean, modern design. Not a medical device. No dosing advice.
promotionalText: A simpler, calmer daily flow for T1D. Plan, prepare, and move with confidence.
